str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To begin, am, exist, be in possession. From hupo and archomai; to begin under, i.e. Come into existence; expletively, to exist (verb).
Full, abounding in, complete, completely occupied with. From pletho; replete, or covered over; by analogy, complete.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To direct my gaze, look steadily. From a compound of a and teino; to gaze intently.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
On the right hand, right hand, right. From dechomai; the right side or hand.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
